exceptions.exn: The reference invc_dup_drop_step_star was not found in the current environment.

original: induction l'; intros; simpl in *. - contradiction. - invc_dup_drop_step_star. unfold remove at 1 in *. break_if; try now constructor. apply dup_drop_step_star_app_inv in H2. * repeat find_reverse_rewrite. eapply dup_drop_step_star_trans with (l':= a :: l'); auto. eapply dup_drop_step_star_weak_on_hd; auto. * rewrite in_app_iff. intuition; eauto.
